archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.10: Prior to the implementation of new or updated hardware, any associated software should be subject to system hardening (e.g. changing default vendor passwords; removing or disabling unnecessary accounts, services, applications and scripts; and applying secure configuration settings).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
